name: openbudgeteer
description: OpenBudgeteer is a self-hosted personal budgeting tool inspired by YNAB. It allows managing envelopes, categories, and expenses across months using a clean, responsive interface.

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Upload bank statements in CSV format for automatic categorization and reconciliation

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Create custom spending groups and subcategories to match your financial structure

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your budget from desktop or mobile browsers with an interface that adapts to screen

features.title: Reporting Tools
features.description: View spending trends, category breakdowns, and historical comparisons to understand financial patterns
